name: sendit-api
description: API endpoints for the sendIT app

scripts.dev: set NODE_ENV=development && nodemon --exec babel-node src --presets airbnb
scripts.db: node src/db.js createUsersTable && node src/db.js createParcelsTable
scripts.db-drop: node src/db.js dropParcelsTable && node src/db.js dropUsersTable
scripts.cover: set NODE_ENV=test && istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --ui bdd -R spec -t 5000 --compilers js:@babel/register --recursive "src/test/*.test.js"
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls

author: UGOJI Duziem
